arts.ttl: Manchester City star arrested in Madrid for robbing mobile phone in nightclub
arts.sum: Manchester City star Mathues Nunes was linked with a move to Atletico Madrid in the summer, but the Portuguese midfielder has remained at the Etihad this year. It did not stop him from heading to the Spanish capital though, and subsequently getting arrested. According to Marca, who quote information from Luis F. Duran, the 26-year-old […] The post Manchester City star arrested in Madrid for robbing mobile phone in nightclub appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: I saw three Man City players rise to Pep Guardiola challenge - and one who didn't
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola gave some of his Manchester City players a valuable chance to impress in the Champions League at Slovan Bratislava, but not everybody took the opportunity.

arts.ttl: Slovan Bratislava 0-4 Man City: Player ratings as Cityzens breeze to victory
arts.sum: In a game which was rarely a real contest, City roared into an early lead thanks to goals from Ilkay Gundogan and Phil Foden, and the Premier League leaders never looked back. Slovan Bratislava nearly offered a shock start to the game when Tigran Barseghyan found some space on the counter and sent a fizzing effort narrowly wide of Stefan Ortega's net inside the opening two minutes.

arts.ttl: 'I have the feeling' - Pep Guardiola delivers clear Phil Foden judgement
arts.sum: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola spoke about Phil Foden after their Champions League win

arts.ttl: Man City discovered a natural replacement for four players with one tactical change
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola has unlocked a replacement for Kyle Walker, Rodri, Kevin De Bruyne and Julian Alvarez in one player - who cost absolutely nothing.

arts.ttl: De Bruyne, Rodri, Bobb - Man City injury news and return dates ahead of Fulham
arts.sum: Manchester City returned to winning ways on Tuesday night with a comfortable 4-0 victory over Slovan Bratislava in the Champions League

arts.ttl: Man City equal Man United's Champions League record with Bratislava victory
arts.sum: Manchester City equal Manchester United's Champions League record with a commanding 4-0 away win over Slovan Bratislava.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola makes Ilkay Gundogan claim after Newcastle display as he hails response from Man City star
arts.sum: Gundogan scored in 4-0 win over Slovan Bratislava

arts.ttl: Phil Foden and James McAtee earn Pep Guardiola’s praise in Champions League win
arts.sum: Rico Lewis also impressed his manager against Slovan Bratislava.

arts.ttl: 'Big knock' - Pep Guardiola explains Erling Haaland substitution in Man City win
arts.sum: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola spoke about taking Erling Haaland off against Slovan Bratislava
